content: lil penn the kitty clown materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn - white light gray red & orange embroidery floss or crochet thread in red scissors yarn needle fiber fill safety eyes abbreviations used single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase decrease - decrease blo - back loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch magic_ring - magic_ring st - stitch chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet numbers inside are the stitch count for each round the entire pattern is worked in the round head in white 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet x4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet x5 around 42 8 increase single_crochet x6 around 48 9-16 single_crochet around 48st for 8 rounds 17 decrease single_crochet x6 around 42 18 single_crochet around 42 19 decrease single_crochet x5 around 36 20 decrease single_crochet x4 around 30 21 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 22 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 23 blo single_crochet around slip_stitch into next stitch f o leave long tail for sewing body in light gray 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet x4 around 36 7-11 single_crochet around 36st 5 rnds 12 decrease single_crochet x4 around 30 13-14 single_crochet around 30 15 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 16 single_crochet around 24 17 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 18-20 single_crochet around 18st 3 rnds slip_stitch into next st f o tuck tail inside or weave in arms make 2 first three rounds are done in white then switch to light gray 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 single_crochet around 18 5 single_crochet blo around 18 6-8 single_crochet around 18st 3 rnds 9 decrease single_crochet around 12 10-12 single_crochet around 12 13 decrease single_crochet x4 decrease single_crochet x4 10 14-24 single_crochet around 10st 11 rnds slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing arm ruffle attach light gray with a slip_stitch into one of the front loops left in round 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet increase into each st around slip_stitch to join into the top of the 1st half_double_crochet fo weave in end legs make 2 in light gray 1 6sc into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6 single_crochet around 30 7 single_crochet blo around 30 8-10 single_crochet around 30st 3 rnds 11 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 12-13 single_crochet around 24 14 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 15-17 single_crochet around 18st 3 rnds slip_stitch into next st f o leave long tail for sewing leg ruffle attach light gray with a slip_stitch into one of the front loops left in round 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet increase into each st around slip_stitch to join into the top of the 1st half_double_crochet
